attributes.action: make non alcohol drinks in pubs cheaper
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Why does the government complain about binge drinking but allows the consumer to be charged ridiculous prices for a non alcoholic drink in pubs?

A drinker can have a pint, the non drinker is lucky to get a 330ml drink. A drinker has the opportunity of taking advantage of 'happy hour' or 'two for one' offers, the non drinker is given no such option. 

Why should it be cheaper to drink alcohol than not too when out? Who causes the trouble? Who costs the tax payer the most? Who wastes valuable police time? 

Please sign......

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
